Algorithms Modülü

Bu modül, ders programı oluşturma algoritmalarını içerir.

Base Scheduler

Base Scheduler - Common functionality for all schedulers DRY (Don’t Repeat Yourself) principle

This module provides the base class for all scheduling algorithms in the system. It consolidates common scheduling functionality to eliminate code duplication and provide a consistent interface for all scheduler implementations.

Key Features: - State management for schedule entries, teacher slots, and class slots - Conflict detection and validation - Lesson placement and removal operations - Common utility methods (slot finding, availability checking, etc.) - Template methods for subclass customization - Abstract interface for schedule generation

All scheduler implementations should inherit from this class and implement the generate_schedule() method. Subclasses can override template methods like _create_lesson_blocks() to customize behavior.

class algorithms.base_scheduler.BaseScheduler(db_manager: DBManager, progress_callback: Callable[[str, int], None] | None = None)[kaynak]

Bases: ABC

Base class for all scheduling algorithms Contains common functionality to avoid code duplication

This class provides: - State management (schedule_entries, teacher_slots, class_slots) - Conflict detection and validation - Lesson placement and removal - Common utility methods for scheduling - Template methods for subclass customization

Subclasses must implement: - generate_schedule(): Main scheduling algorithm

Subclasses can override: - _create_lesson_blocks(): Custom block distribution logic - _load_scheduler_weights(): Custom weight loading

SCHOOL_TIME_SLOTS = {'Anadolu Lisesi': 8, 'Fen Lisesi': 8, 'Lise': 8, 'Ortaokul': 7, 'Sosyal Bilimler Lisesi': 8, 'İlkokul': 7}
DAYS = ['Pazartesi', 'Salı', 'Çarşamba', 'Perşembe', 'Cuma']

class algorithms.hybrid_optimal_scheduler.HybridOptimalScheduler(db_manager)[kaynak]

Bases: object

En Güçlü Scheduler - Tüm Teknikleri Birleştirir

Aşamalar: 1. Hazırlık: Verileri al, analiz et 2. İlk Çözüm: Simple Perfect Scheduler ile başlangıç çözümü 3. CSP Refinement: Arc consistency ve backtracking ile iyileştirme 4. Soft Optimization: Simulated annealing ile soft constraint’leri optimize et 5. Final Validation: Tüm kısıtlamaları kontrol et ve raporla

Ultra Aggressive Scheduler

Ultra Aggressive Scheduler - %100 Doluluk Hedefli Boş hücre KALMAYANA kadar sürekli iyileştirme yapar!

class algorithms.ultra_aggressive_scheduler.UltraAggressiveScheduler(db_manager, progress_callback: Callable | None = None)[kaynak]

Bases: object

%100 Doluluk Hedefli Ultra Agresif Scheduler

Strateji: 1. İlk tur: Simple Perfect Scheduler ile başla 2. Boş hücre analizi: Hangi sınıfta kaç saat eksik? 3. İteratif iyileştirme: Boş hücreleri doldurmaya çalış 4. Relaxation: Gerekirse kuralları esnet (kontrollü) 5. Sürekli deneme: Tablo dolana kadar dur!

Advanced Scheduler

Advanced Scheduling Algorithm with Scoring and Smart Distribution

This module implements an advanced scheduling algorithm that inherits from BaseScheduler to leverage common scheduling functionality while providing sophisticated features like:

  • Weighted scoring system for placement optimization

  • Smart block distribution across the week

  • Advanced conflict resolution with backtracking

  • Teacher load balancing

  • Distribution quality metrics

The scheduler has been refactored to inherit from BaseScheduler, eliminating code duplication and improving maintainability while preserving all advanced scheduling capabilities.

class algorithms.advanced_scheduler.AdvancedScheduler(db_manager, progress_callback=None)[kaynak]

Bases: BaseScheduler

Advanced scheduler with scoring system and smart distribution

Inherits from BaseScheduler to leverage common scheduling functionality.

Key Features: - Smart block distribution with scoring system - Weighted placement scoring for optimal slot selection - Advanced conflict resolution with backtracking - Teacher load balancing - Distribution quality optimization

The scheduler uses a scoring system with configurable weights to evaluate placement quality and make intelligent scheduling decisions.

__init__(db_manager, progress_callback=None)[kaynak]

Initialize base scheduler

Parametreler:

  • db_manager – Database manager instance

  • progress_callback – Optional callback for progress updates (message, percentage)

generate_schedule() → List[Dict][kaynak]

Generate optimized schedule using lesson assignments

Returns list of schedule entries

Uses BaseScheduler state management (class_slots, teacher_slots, schedule_entries)

prioritize_lessons(class_lessons: List[Dict]) → List[Dict][kaynak]

Dersleri önceliklendirme stratejisi

Kriterler: 1. Haftalık saat sayısı (fazla olan önce) 2. Zorluk derecesi (zor olan önce) 3. Öğretmen müsaitlik durumu

optimal_block_distribution(weekly_hours: int) → List[int][kaynak]

Haftalık saate göre optimal blok dağılımı

Örnekler: - 6 saat: [2, 2, 2] (3 gün) - 5 saat: [2, 2, 1] (3 gün) - 4 saat: [2, 2] (2 gün) - 3 saat: [2, 1] (2 gün) - 2 saat: [2] (1 gün) - 1 saat: [1] (1 gün)

preferred_time_slots(lesson_name: str, time_slots_count: int) → List[int][kaynak]

Ders için tercih edilen slotlar

Zor dersler: Sabah (0-3) Orta dersler: Gün ortası (2-5) Hafif dersler: Herhangi (0-7)

Local Search

Simulated Annealing - Tavlama Benzetimi Kısmi çözümü iyileştirmek için yerel arama

optimize(initial_schedule: List[Dict], evaluate_func, neighbor_func, constraints_check=None) → List[Dict][kaynak]

Simulated annealing ile programı iyileştir

Parametreler:

  • initial_schedule – Başlangıç programı

  • evaluate_func – Programı değerlendiren fonksiyon (yüksek = iyi)

  • neighbor_func – Komşu çözüm üreten fonksiyon

  • constraints_check – Hard constraint kontrolü (opsiyonel)

Dönüşler:

İyileştirilmiş program

class algorithms.local_search.ScheduleNeighborGenerator(db_manager, time_slots_count: int = 8)[kaynak]

Bases: object

Program için komşu çözüm üretici ÖNEMLİ: Blok bütünlüğünü ve hard constraint’leri korur!

__init__(db_manager, time_slots_count: int = 8)[kaynak]
generate_neighbor(schedule: List[Dict]) → List[Dict][kaynak]

Komşu çözüm üret - BLOKLARI KORUYARAK küçük değişiklikler yap

ÖNEMLİ KURALLAR (HARD CONSTRAINTS): 1. Blok bütünlüğü korunmalı (2 saatlik dersler ardışık kalmalı) 2. Her blok farklı günde olmalı 3. Öğretmen uygunluğu kontrol edilmeli

Stratejiler: 1. Aynı dersin tüm bloklarını başka güne taşı (BLOK KORUMA) 2. İki dersin bloklarını yer değiştir (BLOK KORUMA) 3. Tek saatlik dersleri taşı

algorithms.local_search.adaptive_backtrack_limit(num_classes: int, num_teachers: int, avg_lessons_per_class: int) → int[kaynak]

Problem boyutuna göre adaptif backtrack limiti

Parametreler:

  • num_classes – Sınıf sayısı

  • num_teachers – Öğretmen sayısı

  • avg_lessons_per_class – Sınıf başına ortalama ders sayısı

Dönüşler:

Backtrack limiti

Constraint Priority Manager

Constraint Priority Manager - User-Configurable Constraint Priorities Allows users to set priorities for different scheduling constraints

class algorithms.constraint_priority_manager.ConstraintPriority(*values)[kaynak]

Bases: IntEnum

Constraint priority levels

CRITICAL = 5
HIGH = 4
MEDIUM = 3
LOW = 2
OPTIONAL = 1
class algorithms.constraint_priority_manager.ConstraintPriorityManager[kaynak]

Bases: object

Manage constraint priorities for scheduling

Features: - User-configurable priorities - Profile management (save/load) - Constraint validation - Priority-based scoring - Conflict resolution strategies

DEFAULT_CONSTRAINTS = {'balanced_daily_load': {'category': 'soft', 'default_priority': ConstraintPriority.MEDIUM, 'description': 'Each day should have similar number of lessons', 'name': 'Balanced Daily Load'}, 'block_integrity': {'category': 'soft', 'default_priority': ConstraintPriority.HIGH, 'description': 'Lessons should be in blocks (2+2+2, 2+2+1, etc.)', 'name': 'Block Integrity'}, 'different_days_for_blocks': {'category': 'soft', 'default_priority': ConstraintPriority.HIGH, 'description': 'Each block should be on a different day', 'name': 'Different Days for Blocks'}, 'difficult_lessons_morning': {'category': 'soft', 'default_priority': ConstraintPriority.MEDIUM, 'description': 'Math, Physics, etc. should be in morning slots', 'name': 'Difficult Lessons in Morning'}, 'lesson_spacing': {'category': 'soft', 'default_priority': ConstraintPriority.LOW, 'description': 'Same lesson should be 2-3 days apart', 'name': 'Lesson Spacing'}, 'lunch_break_preference': {'category': 'soft', 'default_priority': ConstraintPriority.OPTIONAL, 'description': 'Light lessons during lunch hours', 'name': 'Lunch Break Preference'}, 'max_consecutive_same_lesson': {'category': 'hard', 'default_priority': ConstraintPriority.HIGH, 'description': 'No more than 2 hours of the same lesson consecutively', 'name': 'Max Consecutive Same Lesson'}, 'no_class_conflicts': {'category': 'hard', 'default_priority': ConstraintPriority.CRITICAL, 'description': 'A class cannot have two lessons at the same time', 'name': 'No Class Conflicts'}, 'no_gaps': {'category': 'soft', 'default_priority': ConstraintPriority.MEDIUM, 'description': 'Students should not have gaps in their schedule', 'name': 'No Gaps'}, 'no_teacher_conflicts': {'category': 'hard', 'default_priority': ConstraintPriority.CRITICAL, 'description': 'A teacher cannot teach two classes at the same time', 'name': 'No Teacher Conflicts'}, 'teacher_availability': {'category': 'hard', 'default_priority': ConstraintPriority.HIGH, 'description': 'Teachers can only teach when they are available', 'name': 'Teacher Availability'}, 'teacher_load_balance': Check if constraint should be enforced

Parametreler:

  • constraint_id – Constraint identifier

  • strict_mode – If True, enforce HIGH and above; if False, enforce CRITICAL only

Dönüşler:

Parametreler:

Dönüşler:

create_preset_profile(preset_name: str) → bool[kaynak]

Create a preset profile

Available presets: - ‘strict’: All constraints HIGH or CRITICAL - ‘balanced’: Mix of priorities (default) - ‘flexible’: Most constraints LOW or OPTIONAL - ‘speed’: Only CRITICAL constraints enforced

Parametreler:

preset_name – Name of preset

Dönüşler:

True if created successfully
